import React, { useState } from 'react'; import TableItem from "./TableItem"; export default function Table() { let ItemList = ["Tony","Allo","Verya","Fornis","loosens","Jabasprit","Lostemfo","Jersayem"]; const [List, UpdateList] = useState(ItemList); return (
{List.map((item,index)=>{ return })}
Name Title Status Role
); }
